name: Lil'Fish Island
description:
Welcome on the Lil'Fish Island ! Go fishing to discover all the species of Lil'Fish and complete your fishy book.

We made this game in 5 days to learn how to use Github.

Controls

Press F to start fishing when you are near the lake or the ocean. Press space when the exclamation point appears. Press space again when the yellow point is in the green zone.
You can see all the Lil'Fish you have caught by pressing E.

Game artists : Galadriel LAVASIER

Game programmers : Tom SEGAUX , Dan CHEYPE , Enguerrand COUSIN
